ygData.messageBody:
Personally I'd love to be able to enchant items, but I also have to agree
that since we've come this close to being balanced with the other classes
(that arent fucked up), we might be asking for trouble. I thought of the
problem of there being a sudden surge of magical weapons in norrath and how
that could completely flood a possible market quite quickly, but I suppose
that could be solved by making enchant : item, ore, weapon very high level
spells, and either a lore item/quest item or in a difficult place (or
unobvious) place to get it. Then will it make us that much tougher? Well
you can certainly imagine there will be a few more people interested in
playing enchanters, and personally I think I see enough enchanters now (I'd
like to be the only one really). We'd be in very high demand, but we have
gotten that from some other spells like clarity (IMHO our greatest asset not
unlike SoW). Yeas well you can see how scattered my thinking is today so
I'm shuttin up. You can pick that apart.

Cogg - Rallos Zek (20)


btw, what do you think of the last name Zilla? I think its cheezy myself
but many seem to like the idea... any suggestions?
